INVALID_TYPE_OBJECT: The value of "{paramName}" must be an object.
INVALID_TYPE_STRING: The value of "{paramName}" must be a string.
INVALID_TYPE_NUMBER: The value of "{paramName}" must be a number.
INVALID_TYPE_INTEGER: The value of "{paramName}" must be a whole number.
INVALID_TYPE_BOOLEAN: The value of "{paramName}" must be true or false.
OUT_OF_RANGE_GREATER_THAN: The value of "{paramName}" must be greater than {threshold}.
OUT_OF_RANGE_LESS_THAN: The value of "{paramName}" must be less than {threshold}.
OUT_OF_RANGE_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL: The value of "{paramName}" must be greater than or equal to {threshold}.
OUT_OF_RANGE_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL: The value of "{paramName}" must be less than or equal to {threshold}.
ENUM: The value of "{paramName}" must be one of {allowedValues}
INVALID_TYPE_ARRAY: The value of "{paramName}" must be an array.
INVALID_TYPE_STRING_ARRAY: The value of "{paramName}" must be an array of strings.
OVERLAY_SINK_NOT_FOUND: You specified "on" but the id {overlayId} doesn't exist.
SERIES_SCALE_NOT_FOUND: {scale} isn't a valid scale name; the only valid names are primary or secondary.
MISSING_KEY_FIELD_FOR_SERIES: "keyField" is required when you're specifying a series.
INVALID_SCALE: {scale} isn't a valid scale name; the only valid names are primary or secondary.
DURATION_CANNOT_BE_NEGATIVE: "{paramName}" must be a Duration or a non-negative number of seconds.
